basics.name: Kartik Puri
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a programming enthusiast and Oracle Certified Java SE 8 programmer. As a professional, I am keen to work on challenging projects that acquire knowledge of new concepts and development techniques. I am seeking a dynamic and challenging opportunity to up-scale my career path and contribute to the success of the company.

work.summary: Working as a full stack developer building a cloud-based platform to facilitate sharing health data within and across organizational boundaries with policy-based access control.
highlights: Write new and maintain existing code in various programming languages including Kotlin, Java and Python.
Develop REST APIs using Kotlin and Vert.x to manage the cloud-based platform.
Document application and framework code.
Build product user interface using Vue.js and Vuetify to interact with cloud-based platform.
Write and run automated unit and integration tests in Mockk, Python, Jest and Cypress.

work.summary: Worked on an XML parser to parse millions of records in a data pipeline.
highlights: Developed a PySpark script to run on Amazon EMR cluster to load and save data to and from S3.
Parsing of XML data stored in files to a columnar format.
Validation of parsed XML data against Redshift Database for aggregated and one to one results using SQL queries and Pandas.

work.summary: Worked as a Web QA Developer to perform functional testing of the product.
highlights: Creating detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases aiming to test the functionality of the product.
Developed scripts for automated tests to ensure product quality using Python and Splinter (Selenium).

work.summary: Worked as a system administrator in a data center to ensure high availability of sun servers running Sun Solaris 10 and Sun Solaris 11.
highlights: Authored Bash scripts to perform daily tasks.
Scheduled jobs with crontab.
Configuration and Administration of Logical Domains, virtual servers running on single hardware instance.
Management of cluster nodes running Oracle 10G and SAP services.
Debugging server logs for any hardware or software failure.
Administration of individual services on cluster nodes to ensure high availability of servers.

work.summary: Worked as an Intern performing Android Multimedia Testing on Set Top Boxes
highlights: Automated testing of multimedia ST Set Top Boxes.
Developed an Android Media Player application intended to work with DLNA device.
Enhancements to a Perl-based testing framework.
Enhancements to an Android application used for testing multimedia.
